title: pixel 3 XL stuck in boot loop and can't force shutdown nor boot into recovery
content:
Hi 
My pixel 3 XL suddenly rebooted and keeps rebooting without stopping.
It reboots and the google logo appears for a second then the phone reboots again. I tried to force shutdown, but it doesn't shutdown.
I tried to boot into recovery but the phone doesn't response.

The phone is getting warm now, and nothing is changing.

Please advice
